Geothermal energy.Description: Geothermal energy is produced by geothermal power plants that harness heat from the Earth's core.
Geothermal energy is utilized by geothermal heat pumps for heating and cooling buildings.
Geothermal energy is extracted from underground geothermal reservoirs that contain hot water or steam.
Geothermal energy is supported by organizations like the Geothermal Energy Association that promote its development and use.
